item.title: Authentication Demystify
item.description: In the process of revamping an old (classic) PHP application to a modern Single Page Application, I need to re-write the Authentication module. This slide is my research on common questions / knowledege about Authentication: How the Authentication happened in the old PHP application? How it handled expired users, and keep active users connect? What is the Oauth2, OpenId JWT What is 2-Factor authentication? How to implement it? The most important part is my Refresh-token strategy.
